content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers is the administrative body that co-ordinates the NADAP program for mediations and arbitrations.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1495810152786{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]If you have questions regarding the NADAP Program, please email us at nadap@adrchambers.com.

If you have a Request for a NADAP Mediation or Arbitration, please fax or email your Notice to ADR Chambers. Please deliver all briefs to the address below:

NADAP Co-ordinator
c/o ADR Chambers Inc.
180 Duncan Mill Road, 4th Floor
North York, ON, M3B 1Z6

Phone: 1-800-856-5154
Email: nadap@adrchambers.com
Fax: 1-877-862-8825

NADAP Rules and NADAP Arbitration Award Digest

Click the link below to download the NADAP Rules or the NADAP Arbitration Award Digest. A password is required to download and open the files. To obtain the password, please contact the NADAP Co-ordinator.

NADAP Rules – English (PDF) or Français (PDF)

NADAP Arbitration Award Digest (PDF)

NADAP Administrator

The Administrator of the NADAP program is Allan J. Stitt.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”153″][vc_custom_heading text=”Arbitration” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”68″][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”72″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
